sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react"; import PDF from "../PDF/PDF"; import Button from "../Button/Button"; import { Element } from "react-scroll"; import Training from "./Training/Training"; import Certification from "./Certification/Certification"; import { AboutContainer, AboutHeaderContainer, ContentWrapper, AboutHeader, BioWrapper, BioTextWrapper, BioText, ProfilePic, } from "./AboutStyles"; import profileImage from "../../assets/headshot.png"; class About extends Component { state = { modal: false, }; togglePDF = () => { this.setState({ modal: !this.state.modal }); }; render() { return ( About Hi! My name is Khanh. I am an IT-Professional with over 20 years of experience in Infratructure, Systems, and Application Support for highly visible, public facing Enterprise applications in the Financial, Insurance, and E-commerce industries. I have the skills, training ,and experience needed to help develop, support, and maintain software programs.
